article_title: Tobacco tax for Medicaid plan faces challenges in legislature
article_text:
Tobacco tax for Medicaid plan faces challenges in legislature

Posted May. 1, 2016 at 8:30 AM

article_metadata.description: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — A plan to shift coverage for some of Oklahoma’s Medicaid recipients in order to trigger an infusion of federal funding appears to be gaining support among Republican lawmakers, but the idea of funding it with a tobacco tax is facing uphill sledding in the GOP-controlled Legislature.The Medicaid Rebalancing Act of 2020 was unveiled this spring by state health officials as an alternative to a Medicaid expansion under the Affordable Care Act, which has been
